card_1766293528773_1uz78vojb.front: When a circle of radius R revolves around another circle of radius 3R, how many times does the smaller circle rotate in one revolution
card_1766293528773_1uz78vojb.back: 4, when we consider that the smaller circle rolls without slipping, the effective angular velocity becomes 4\omega where \omega is the rotation of the circle about its own axis
